div.p: Simulated ocean changes (year 8000 minus year 2000). a, b Oxygen in mmol O 2 m −3; c, d ideal age in years; e, f total oxygen utilisation in mmol O 2 m −3; and g, h remineralisation below 125 m in mmol O 2 m −3 year −1. The left hand column (panels a, c, e, g) shows vertically averaged changes, the right hand column shows zonally averaged changes. Contour lines in panels b and d refer to the zonally integrated meridional overturning stream function with transport in units Sv (10 6 m 3 s −1)
